entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as someone who will be notified when the golden cup is missing.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A character mentioned as being notified by the goblins of Gringotts.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: The bank where Bellatrix is associated with.

relationships.description: Voldemort will be notified when the goblins of Gringotts notify Bellatrix that the golden cup is missing.
The goblins of Gringotts will notify Bellatrix when they discover that the golden cup is missing.
